abstract: The cellphone giant is battling to maintain its position in the face of competition from the iPhone and Android.
snippet: The cellphone giant is battling to maintain its position in the face of competition from the iPhone and Android.
lead_paragraph: Nokia, the cellphone giant battling to maintain its position in the face of competition from the iPhone and Android, said Tuesday that it was abandoning its 2011 profit targets after an unexpectedly poor second-quarter showing.

headline.main: Nokia Lowers Second-Quarter Forecast and Abandons 2011 Profit Goals
headline.print_headline: Nokia Lowers Second-Quarter Forecast and Abandons 2011 Profit Goals
